설명: Eligibility Foreign aspiring or early-stage entrepreneurs residing in Seoul or enrolled in a university in Seoul Foreign early-stage entrepreneurs who have established a company in Seoul Foreign aspiring entrepreneurs who wish to start a business in Seoul Steps Application → Document Screening → Final Selection Final results notified individually (June 13) If vacancies arise before the program starts, they will be filled based on the priority waiting list Apply Visit the Invest Seoul website → Download and Complete the application form *Submit Online Schedule&Venue June 25(Wed) - July 8(Tue) 2025, 7 PM-9 PM (*Total: 10 days, 20 hours) Venue: Seoul Startup Hub Gongdeok (Located in Gongdeok-dong, Seoul) Course Basic Entrepreneurship (10 Modules: Laws&Regulations, Business Operations, etc.) Benefits 10 points (OASIS-4) to obtain Technology Startup Visa(D-8-4) Requirement: 80% attendance Contact Invest Seoul investseouloasis@gmail.com
